text: Claude George Michael "Mike" McCormack (December 14, 1921 - November 7, 2020) was an American politician. He served as U.S. Representative from the State of Washington's Fourth Congressional District from 1971 to 1981. He was a Democrat.http://bioguide.congress.gov McCormack was born in Baltimore, Ohio. He studied at the University of Toledo and at Washington State University. In 1980, at age 59, in the midst of the "Reagan landslide", McCormack unsuccessfully sought a sixth term against Sid Morrison. McCormack died in Medford, Oregon on November 7, 2020 at the age of 98.Mike McCormack Congressional Biography ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1921 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Ohio Category:United States representatives from Washington Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Mike McCormack
